channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: IHG is introducing another new collection brand
item.description: IHG is adding another soft brand to its portfolio.

item.title: How much should I tip when I travel?
item.description: Even the most seasoned travelers may find that tipping while traveling can be an extremely complex and personal thing.

item.title: 'Winter is here' as first US ski resorts of the season open their lifts
item.description: The U.S. ski season is off to a fresh start, with Keystone and A-Basin opening this weekend.

item.title: New Chase Sapphire Reserve perks live today: Valuable credits and changes to earning rates
item.description: Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholders can now access new travel and lifestyle credits. Plus, key changes to earning and redeeming points are now in effec...

item.title: Delta Air Lines launches new service to Marrakech, Morocco: What it was like on the inaugural
item.description: TPG was onboard as Delta Air Lines launched a new service from Atlanta to Marrakech, Morocco
